name: DODAQ
overview:
DODAQ is the world’s first online certified diamond exchange which uniquely offers electronic two-way auctions for buyers and sellers to trade individual diamond categories based on real time tradable spot prices.

DODAQ facilitates vaulting and transportation services through our professional custodian, Malca-Amit, assuring you complete security of your portfolio at all times, whether taking physical delivery or building a diamond investment holding. All monetary settlement is executed through ABN AMRO Bank.

DODAQ acts as a counter-party providing a seamless transaction between you and other participants, guaranteeing that the physical and monetary transfer is executed instantaneously.
